 2013-12522013-11-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HRSDC,  LAB, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectOrder Repealing the Fair Wages Policy Order
PrecisOrder Repealing THE FAIR WAGES POLICY ORDER in order to avoid confusion about the wage requirements that apply to Government construction contracts given that the Fair Wages and Hours of Labour Act is being repealed.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0205 Publication Date: 2013-12-04
